description: As discussed in http://bit.ly/wardpost, the City of Chicago changed to a new ward map on 5/18/2015, affecting some datasets.  This ZIP file contains a CSV export from 5/15/2015 of the "Crimes - 2001 to present" dataset.  Due to size limitations, this file had to be separated from the CSV exports of the other datasets, which are at https://data.cityofchicago.org/d/q6z8-94kn.  This CSV file contains a close-to-final version of the crimes dataset with the previous ("2003") ward values.

name: 2003 Ward Dataset CSVs - Crimes - 2001 to present
